name: MetaPhysics Or A brief intro into Cats, Gloves, Trains, Choice, and Existence
name_original: MetaPhysics Or A brief intro into Cats, Gloves, Trains, Choice, and Existence
description:
is at the moment a brief-ish lecture, if I can call it that, about theoretical physics and life.

Making of Video

Game currently includes

  • Full gamepad support for Xbox360 & XboxOne Controllers
  • A playable build
  • Cats
  • Gloves
  • Trains
  • And to say more would ruin the lesson...

Known Issues

  • Bad Audio Quality (I need to buy an actual microphone, not just the one on
    my webcam)
  • Lack of content, there will be more. Just be patient.
  • In beta patch (flag physics disabled since it was causing crashes in unity 5.4)
Fixed Issues (in beta patch)
  • Mouse smoothing removed
  • Pause menu cursor locking fixed
  • Improved Gamepad support

So please give it a go, and do let me know what you thought of my teaching abilities. If you want to learn about a particular subject in physics / philosophy, please comment below, so I can include it in the next update (and I will, trust me).
